entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Greater Sudbury
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:29 a.m. EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 9.4Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Greater Sudbury Airport 1:00 PM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 9.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 16 km
Humidity: 96 %
Dewpoint: 8.8°C
Wind: ENE 18 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Sunday: Rain. Temperature steady near 10.
